grails.plugin.springsecurity.acl.annotation

Annotation Type AclVoter


  • @Target(value={FIELD,METHOD,TYPE})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
public @interface AclVoter
    Annotation for Controllers or Services at the class level or per-action/per-method, defining what roles and/or ACL voters are required for the entire controller or action.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String configAttribute
      The config attribute, e.g.
      java.lang.String name
      The bean name of the associated Voter.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] permissions
      The BasePermission constant names that are required.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The bean name of the associated Voter.
        Returns:
        the name

      • configAttribute

        public abstract java.lang.String configAttribute
        The config attribute, e.g. ACL_REPORT_WRITE.
        Returns:
        the attribute

      • permissions

        public abstract java.lang.String[] permissions
        The BasePermission constant names that are required. Defaults to BasePermission.READ.
        Returns:
        the names
        Default:
        "READ"
